metadata.description: Torajirou and Sakura have survived their lousy childhoods by watching each other's backs. When Sakura finds himself at the mercy of a yakuza gang, Tora has to do what he can to save his best friend. Will he be able to win back Sakura's freedom, or has Tora bitten off more than he can chew?------------Translated by creamysalad; Edited by Andi Van; Lettered by Kalé Luna
metadata.name: Betting My Life With You
